alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Williston Highlands to near Cross Creek. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Archer, Micanopy, Reddick, McIntosh and Flemington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
